title: ðŸ“¬ Mailbag Monday: Packers disrespect plus best players and coaches without a Super Bowl ring (Football 7/20)
description:
It's another mid-summer Monday Mailbag! Will Brinson, Ryan Wilson and John Breech link up to answer listener questions. Will there be Superfriends auditions following the departure of Sean Wagner-McGough? One Pick Six fan has a suggestion! The Packers went 13-3 and made the NFC Championship last year, but aren't discussed among the top favorites entering 2020. Is that fair? Will, Ryan and John also discuss DeAndre Hopkins' outlook in Arizona, the best players and coaches to never win a Super Bowl and beer.
Nominate Pick Six for The People's Choice Podcast Awards: https://www.podcastawards.com/app/signup/
